allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
S1-T1: Initialize Flutter project with package name com.kashkash

- Created Flutter project with `flutter create --org com.kashkash`
- Set iOS minimum deployment target to 13.0
- Set Android minSdk to 21, targetSdk to 34
- Added root .gitignore to exclude local Flutter SDK
- Project analyzes without issues

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
S1-T2: Add Flutter core dependencies and configure Riverpod

- Added all required dependencies: riverpod, drift, go_router, dio, etc.
- Added monitoring packages: sentry_flutter, aptabase_flutter
- Added dev dependencies: build_runner, drift_dev, riverpod_generator
- Wrapped app with ProviderScope for Riverpod state management
- Updated smoke test for new app structure

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
S1-T3: Create clean architecture folder structure

- Created core/ with constants, errors, utils, extensions
- Created domain/ with entities, repositories, usecases
- Created data/ with datasources \(local/remote\), models, repositories
- Created infrastructure/ with gps, sync, background
- Created presentation/ with providers, screens, widgets, theme
- Created router/
- Added barrel export files for all modules

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
S1-T4: Implement Drift database schema

- Defined Users table with id, email, displayName, role
- Defined Quests table with coordinates, difficulty, locationType
- Defined QuestAttempts table with status tracking
- Defined PathPoints table for GPS coordinates during gameplay
- Defined SyncQueue table for offline sync operations
- Generated Drift database code successfully

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
S1-T5: Create domain entities \(User, Quest, QuestAttempt, PathPoint\)

- Added User entity with role enum \(user, admin\)
- Added Quest entity with difficulty and locationType enums
- Added QuestAttempt entity with status enum \(inProgress, completed, abandoned\)
- Added PathPoint entity for GPS coordinates
- All entities are immutable with copyWith methods
- Exported via entities barrel file

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
